title: Kayn Icons Missions Didn't Appear Until Yesterday?
body: the two kayn icon missions didnt appear for me until yesterday for the first time, and there was only two days left to complete them when i should have been able to start them last month... kinda not fair imo especially since ive played a bunch of matches with kayn already and i only get credit for the two that ive played since the missions finally decided to appear.

replies.body: Those Kayn missions weren't available for everyone, only to those who were able to play him (purchased or free weekend). The main reason behind that is due to the fact that some of the mission requirements needed you to play as Kayn.
ah ok that makes sense, i still think they should have at least been available to everyone whether they had kayn or not
Kayn was free to play this week and is why the missions appear if you didn't own him before.
